Communications to be addressed to The Crown Agents for the Colonies, 4, Millbank, London, S.W.I, the above refer ence quoted. _ (Inland: “Crown Sowkst London.” i ELKGRAMS j q versias . “CROWN, LONDON.” '> Telephone : Abbey 7730. H~>0 © 4, MILLBANK, LONDON, S.W.I. 2?th January 1942. I have the honour to refer to your le tter _ P.Z. 64 79/40 of 5jth December, 1940 and to enquire whether you have been able to arrange through the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf to obtain a refund of £P 9.800 mils from the Government of Bahrein for reimbursement to the Government of Palestine in respect of photographs supplied. I have the honour to be. for Grown Agents. The Under Secretary of State., India Office, Whitehall. cw' O101. -/9/41 RECd. POL. DEPt§I* 1 • 23 JAN 942 INDIA OFFICE J rwb En. To.4 br P/.G.O./Pal. 6. Nt>; A/1 /1 • Th^-.Tjfea. su ry, ,, r^3~i^s alem t Dated 26th September, 1940# ■deceived 15th November, 1940. Gentlemen, I have the honour to enclose copies of invoices in respect of photographs supplied to the Government of Bahrain amounting to £P. 9. 800 mils. 2. I shall be obliged if you will recover the sum of £P.9*800 mils from the Government of Bahrain and credit my general account with you. i have the honour to be. Gentlemen, sgd. ?. for Ag, Acc. General. Crown Agents for the Colonies.

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: PZ 6479/40 Correspondence regarding Payment for Photographs supplied by the Government of Palestine to the Government of Bahrain

physicalDescription.extent: The correspondence is arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the volume.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 12; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located at the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence between the Government of Palestine, the Crown Agents for the Colonies and the India Office regarding a request from the Government of Palestine for payment for a number of photographs sent to the Government of Bahrain. The file also contains correspondence from the Public Relations Officer, Persian Gulf, Bahrain, confirming that such payment had been made.
